function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of transparency in the model-agnostic design may lead to inaccurate risk assessment.","Impact":"Incorrect risk assessment could result in inadequate building access restrictions during pandemics.","Mitigation":"Provide clear documentation and validation processes for the model to ensure accuracy.","Technologies":"Model validation tools and documentation systems.","People":"Occupants of buildings during pandemics.","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials, and building management."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of real-world variability in occupant behavior and building characteristics may lead to inaccurate exposure assessments.","Impact":"Inaccurate exposure assessments could result in ineffective building access restrictions during pandemics.","Mitigation":"Incorporate real-world data and considerations into the model to account for variability.","Technologies":"Data collection tools, sensors, and machine learning algorithms for pattern recognition.","People":"Occupants of buildings during pandemics.","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials, and building management."},{"Description":"Inaccurate simulation of agent interactions may lead to underestimation of occupant exposure in confined spaces.","Impact":"Underestimation of occupant exposure may result in inadequate building access restrictions during pandemics.","Mitigation":"Refine and validate the simulation algorithms to accurately represent agent interactions.","Technologies":"Microscopic crowd modeling software, simulation validation tools, and agent behavior analysis tools.","People":"Occupants of buildings during pandemics.","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials, and building management."}]}
